column4: can i boot ubuntu from a hard drive without having grub on a floppy or on the hard drive?
no i mean no boot loader on the HDD, and i have no floppy
you can get bootable CDs, your bios might support booting from USB
you might be able to get grub to launch from a CD, not easily tho
there are a number of tutorials on creating a whole linux system on USB boot. find one of those, it should give you bootloader info
